Class Project

java.lang.Object
model.Project
public class Project extends Object
Represents a Build‐To‐Order (BTO) project, including its name, neighborhood, unit types, application period, assigned manager, officer slots, and visibility status.

Provides operations to add new flat types, check unit availability, and determine if applications are currently open.

Since:
24/4/2025
Version:
final
Author:
FCSH Group 2

  • Constructor Details

    • Project

      public Project(String projectName, String neighborhood, LocalDate openingDate, LocalDate closingDate, Manager assignedManager, int officerSlots)
      Constructs a new Project with the specified attributes. Initializes the unitTypes map and sets visibility to true.
      Parameters:
      projectName - the name of the project
      neighborhood - the neighborhood location
      openingDate - date when applications open
      closingDate - date when applications close
      assignedManager - the Manager responsible for this project
      officerSlots - initial number of officer slots

  • Method Details

    • addUnitType

      public void addUnitType(String type, int totalUnits, double price)
      Adds a new unit type to this project.
      Parameters:
      type - the flat type name (e.g., "3-Room")
      totalUnits - the total number of units available initially
      price - the price per unit

    • hasAvailableUnits

      public boolean hasAvailableUnits(String type)
      Checks if there are any available units of the specified type.
      Parameters:
      type - the flat type to check availability for
      Returns:
      true if at least one unit is available; false otherwise

    • isApplicationOpen

      public boolean isApplicationOpen()
      Determines whether applications are currently open based on today's date.
      Returns:
      true if today is between openingDate and closingDate (inclusive)

    • getProjectName

      public String getProjectName()
      Returns the project’s unique name.
      Returns:
      projectName

    • getNeighborhood

      public String getNeighborhood()
      Returns the neighborhood of the project.
      Returns:
      neighborhood

    • getUnitTypes

      public Map<String,UnitType> getUnitTypes()
      Returns the map of flat types available for this project.
      Returns:
      unitTypes

    • getOpeningDate

      public LocalDate getOpeningDate()
      Returns the application opening date.

      Returns:
      assignedManager

    • getOfficerSlots

      public int getOfficerSlots()
      Returns the number of officer slots available.
      Returns:
      officerSlots

    • isVisible

      public boolean isVisible()
      Returns whether the project is visible to applicants.
      Returns:
      true if visible; false otherwise

    • setOpeningDate

      public void setOpeningDate(LocalDate openingDate)
      Sets the application opening date.
      Parameters:
      openingDate - the new opening date

    • setClosingDate

      public void setClosingDate(LocalDate closingDate)
      Sets the application closing date.
      Parameters:
      closingDate - the new closing date

    • setAssignedManager

      public void setAssignedManager(Manager assignedManager)
      Assigns a new Manager to oversee this project.
      Parameters:
      assignedManager - the Manager to assign

    • setOfficerSlots

      public void setOfficerSlots(int officerSlots)
      Sets the number of officer slots available.
      Parameters:
      officerSlots - the number of slots to assign

    • setVisible

      public void setVisible(boolean visible)
      Sets the visibility of this project for applicants.
      Parameters:
      visible - true to make visible; false to hide
